resources.string: Application intended to improve the experience offered by the Parque de las Ciencias Here you can scan your entry, view maps of the park, schedule of activities, temporary activities offered by the park and activate alarms that will warn you that the time of entry to the planetarium or biodomo.
Robots. The humans an the machines

The exhibition "Sea watchers. Your vision is change" aims to show the importance of bringing together all the eyes of citizens to build, together, new knowledge and influence local and global decisions around the marine environment. The sample reflects the contribution of the public to marine research in the last 5 years and makes a tour of the project operation, objectives and results.
The Martian puzzle is a trip to Mars told through impossible postcards, right on the border between science and imagination.

The Window to Science is a transparent space open to the present day of science and technology, a way to show society real research and innovation work, as well as the activity developed in the R and D and I system. A direct window on knowledge led by its protagonists.

It is an international co-production between the Federal Ministry of Industry and Labor of Germany (DASA) and the Science Park, which tackles a huge and current topic with great implications in fields ranging from daily life to World economy, industry, research, transport or health.

WOW offers an original vision of animal life with panoramic scenes of great beauty, loaded at the same time with drama and harmony, as if we had frozen the real life. Knowing these wonders must help us to promote their conservation in the increasingly threatened nature.

The great therapeutic hope of the 21st century. This has been the letter of introduction of stem cells, since in 1974 a group of scientists discovered hematopoietic stem cells in the umbilical cord. Their ability to divide indefinitely without losing their properties and to produce specialized cells have made them one of the main axes of current biomedical research and a scientific field of great interest to society.
